Smart Trash Can: The trash can of the future is a smart device that can recognize what type of waste is being disposed of and sorts it automatically. It can also track the amount of waste produced by a household or business and provide insights on how to reduce it. The can has a built-in compactor that can compress the waste to reduce the amount of space it takes up, making it ideal for small spaces or offices.

Trash Can with Built-in Composter: This trash can has a built-in composter that breaks down organic waste into nutrient-rich soil. The composter is designed to be easy to use and maintain, and it can be used for both indoor and outdoor use. The trash can is made from recycled materials and has a sleek and modern design that fits well with any home or office decor.

Trash Can with Air Purification: This trash can has a built-in air purification system that removes harmful pollutants and allergens from the air. The can is equipped with a HEPA filter that captures 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns, making it ideal for people with respiratory problems or allergies. The trash can is also designed to be aesthetically pleasing and can be placed in any room of the house or office.

Trash Can with Built-in Battery: This trash can has a built-in rechargeable battery that can power small devices such as phones, tablets, or even laptops. The trash can is designed to be compact and portable, making it ideal for travel or for use in areas without access to electricity. The battery can be recharged using a USB port, and the trash can has a sleek and modern design that fits well with any home or office decor.

Trash Can with Augmented Reality Display: This trash can has an augmented reality display that provides information and entertainment to the user. The display can show videos, images, or games, and it can also provide information on how to reduce waste, recycle, or compost.
